item.title: Following up "Mother of all htmx demos"
item.description: Almost 2 years since my talk at DjangoCon Europe about migrating from React to htmx. A lot has been said and asked, here is my follow-up.

item.title: Why I Quit Google to Work for Myself
item.description: For the past four years, I've worked as a software developer at Google. On February 1st, I quit. It was because they refused to buy me a Christmas present.
